verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Hold not thy peace <WH2790>, O God <WH430> of my praise <WH8416>;
For the mouth <WH6310> of the wicked <WH7563> and the mouth <WH6310> of deceit <WH4820> have they opened <WH6605> against me <WH1696>: They have spoken unto me with a lying <WH8267> tongue <WH3956>.
They have compassed <WH5437> me about also with words <WH1697> of hatred <WH8135>, And fought <WH3898> against me without a cause <WH2600>.
For my love <WH160> they are my adversaries <WH7853>: But I give myself unto prayer <WH8605>.
And they have rewarded <WH7760> me evil <WH7451> for good <WH2896>, And hatred <WH8135> for my love <WH160>.
Set <WH6485> thou a wicked man <WH7563> over him <WH7854>; And let an adversary stand <WH5975> at his right hand <WH3225>.
When he is judged <WH8199>, let him come forth <WH3318> guilty <WH7563>; And let his prayer <WH8605> be turned into sin <WH2401>.
Let his days <WH3117> be few <WH4592>; And let another <WH312> take <WH3947> his office <WH6486>.
Let his children <WH1121> be fatherless <WH3490>, And his wife <WH802> a widow <WH490>.
Let his children <WH1121> be <WH5128> vagabonds <WH5128>, and beg <WH7592>; And let them seek <WH1875> their bread out of their desolate places <WH2723>.
Let the extortioner <WH5383> catch <WH5367> all that he hath <WH2114>; And let strangers make spoil <WH962> of his labor <WH3018>.
Let there be none to extend <WH4900> kindness <WH2617> unto him <WH2603>; Neither let there be any to have pity on his fatherless children <WH3490>.
Let his posterity <WH319> be cut off <WH3772>; In the generation <WH1755> following <WH312> let their name <WH8034> be blotted out <WH4229>.
Let the iniquity <WH5771> of his fathers <WH1> be remembered <WH2142> with Jehovah <WH3068>; And let not the sin <WH2403> of his mother <WH517> be blotted out <WH4229>.
Let them be before Jehovah <WH3068> continually <WH8548>, That he may cut off <WH3772> the memory <WH2143> of them from the earth <WH776>;

Because he remembered <WH2142> not to show <WH6213> kindness <WH2617>, But persecuted <WH7291> the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH6041> man <WH376>, And the broken <WH3512> in heart <WH3824>, to slay them <WH4191>.
Yea <WH157>, he loved cursing <WH7045>, and it came <WH935> unto him <WH2654>; And he delighted not in blessing <WH1293>, and it was far from him <WH7368>.

He clothed <WH3847> himself also with cursing <WH7045> as with his garment <WH4055>, And it came <WH935> into his inward <WH7130> parts like water <WH4325>, And like oil <WH8081> into his bones <WH6106>.
Let it be unto him as the raiment <WH899> wherewith he covereth <WH5844> himself <WH4206>, And for the girdle wherewith he is girded <WH2296> continually <WH8548>.
This is the reward <WH6468> of mine adversaries <WH7853> from Jehovah <WH3068>, And of them that speak <WH1696> evil <WH7451> against my soul <WH5315>.
But deal <WH6213> thou with me <WH3069>, O Jehovah the Lord <WH136>, for thy name <WH8034>'s sake <WH2617>: Because thy lovingkindness is good <WH2896>, deliver thou me <WH5337>;
For I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>, And my heart <WH3820> is wounded <WH2490> within me <WH7130>.
I am gone <WH1980> like the shadow <WH6738> when it declineth <WH5186>: I am tossed up and down <WH5287> as the locust <WH697>.
My knees <WH1290> are weak <WH3782> through fasting <WH6685>; And my flesh <WH1320> faileth <WH3584> of fatness <WH8081>.
I am become also a reproach <WH2781> unto them <WH7200>: When they see me <WH5128>, they shake their head <WH7218>.
Help <WH5826> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah my God <WH430>; Oh save <WH3467> me according to thy lovingkindness <WH2617>:
That they may know <WH3045> that this is thy hand <WH3027>; That thou <WH3068>, Jehovah, hast done it <WH6213>.
Let them curse <WH7043>, but bless <WH1288> thou <WH6965>: When they arise, they shall be put to shame <WH954>, But thy servant <WH5650> shall rejoice <WH8055>.
Let mine adversaries <WH7853> be clothed <WH3847> with dishonor <WH3639>, And let them cover <WH5844> themselves with their own shame <WH1322> as with a robe <WH4598>.
I will give great <WH3966> thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068> with my mouth <WH6310>; Yea <WH1984>, I will praise him among <WH8432> the multitude <WH7227>.
For he will stand <WH5975> at the right hand <WH3225> of the needy <WH34>, To save <WH3467> him from them that judge <WH8199> his soul <WH5315>.
